page.title: 13Oxted Pet Shop by E.Bongers.
page.content: The pet shop in Oxted sells food for pets, animal cages and bowls for animals to eat out of. They sell hay, sawdust, padded beds and baskets for cats and dogs. The window always has a lovely display; at the moment it has a pond with a fountain and fish swimming in it. As you go in there are cages with many sorts of birds, including a parrot who talks. There are cages with guinea pigs, hamsters, mice & also big and dwarf rabbits. Near the counter they display squeaky mice for cats, dogs' balls, collars, leads, pretend bones and lots of animals' toys. Guinea pigs cost about Â£6. Rabbits cost about Â£8. There is always a good choice. At the back of the shop are heated tanks with tropical fish. In Oxted people keep many pets and spend a lot of money on them.
